ControlledConcept.gml:description: Body that is very thin relative to lateral extent, so thin that is considered to have only two bounding surfaces (e.g 'top' and 'bottom') and one edge separating these. L=W>>>H. The geometry of the edge is not specified in definition. If the edge comes into play in the definition, becomes ribbon, disc or tablet(?). H is typically in vertical direction.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:sheet
ControlledConcept.name: sheet

ControlledConcept.gml:description: sheet in which L and W axes are straight lines
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:planar_sheet
ControlledConcept.name: planar sheet

ControlledConcept.gml:description: sheet in which one of L or W is a curved arc
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:arcuate_sheet
ControlledConcept.name: arcuate sheet

ControlledConcept.gml:description: sheet that conforms to surface of a cone.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:conical_sheet
ControlledConcept.name: conical sheet

ControlledConcept.gml:description: sheet with 's' curvature of L or W direction
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:sigmoid_sheet
ControlledConcept.name: sigmoid sheet

ControlledConcept.gml:description: sheet in which L and W are curved arcs.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:dome_sheet
ControlledConcept.name: dome sheet

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Body that is very thin relative to width and and length. Long axis may be curved. L>(>>)W>>>H. H is typically in vertical direction.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:ribbon
ControlledConcept.name: ribbon

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Body defined by pairs of parallel, approximately planar surfaces separated by definable edges. Grades to ellipsoid as edges lose definition, to block as axial ratios approach 1, to polygonal cylinder as L approaches W. L>>W>H. H is in vertical direction, L is horizontal.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:tabular_prism
ControlledConcept.name: tabular prism

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Body defined by translation of a generating plane figure with approximately equant cross section (circle, ellipsoid, polygon) along a straight axial line. H>=W=L. Axis is direction normal to generating plane figure, which forms parallel top and bottom bounding surface.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:cylinder
ControlledConcept.name: cylinder

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Cylinder that has elliptical cross section; distinct side surfaces are not defined.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:elliptical_cylinder
ControlledConcept.name: elliptical cylinder

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Elliptical cylinder that has circular symmetry about long axis; distinct side surfaces are not defined. Cross section is circular
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:circular_cylinder
ControlledConcept.name: circular cylinder

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Cylinder in which the edges bounding side surfaces are parallel or subparallel to cylinder axis. Cross section is polygon. Length of axis may be called height or thickness, and is typically in the vertical direction (distinguishing polygonal cylinder from tabular prism and wedge).
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:polygonal_cylinder
ControlledConcept.name: polygonal cylinder

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Body defined by translation of trangle with W >> H along a horizontal axis. A polygonal cylinder with wedge-like triangular generating surface and horizontal axis. Body changes thickness (H) in W direction, approaching 0 thickness on one side. L>>W>H.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:wedge
ControlledConcept.name: wedge

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Polygonal cylinder with height less than length or width, disc with edges separating side into multiple segments.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:tablet
ControlledConcept.name: tablet

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Equant polygonal cylinder, L=W=H, definable edges separate bounding surfaces. Grades to tabular prism as one horizontal dimension becomes distinctly longer than the other, and tablet or polygonal cylinder as one vertical axis becomes distinctly shorter or longer than the horizontal axes.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:block
ControlledConcept.name: block

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Cylinder with very long axis, generally circular or elliptical cross section (generating figure). H>>>W=L. Long axis may be in any orientation, and may be curved.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:rod
ControlledConcept.name: rod

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Cylinder with height less than diameter. L=W>H; edges separates side from top and bottom. Grades to oblate ellipsoid as edges lose definition, .
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:disc
ControlledConcept.name: disc

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Body with two sides that converge to define an edge that is circular in profile; edge separates definable top and bottom. L=W>H. Grades to oblate ellipsoid as edge separating sides loses definition, cone as one side becomes distinctly planar.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:discus
ControlledConcept.name: discus

ControlledConcept.gml:description: discus for which the profile defined by the bounding edge is longer in one direction than other. L>W>>H
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:elongate_discus
ControlledConcept.name: elongate discus

ControlledConcept.gml:description: discus with one planar side, and circular symmetry on axis; geologic cones typically have height <(<) diameter
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:cone
ControlledConcept.name: cone

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Body that contains three orthogonal axes defining three surfaces of reflection symmetry, profiles along the surfaces are elliptical. Boundary can not be separated into sides (no edges). Becomes cylinder or disc when bounding surface can be considered parallel to one of the axis. L>=W>=H
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:ellipsoid
ControlledConcept.name: ellipsoid

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Ellipsoid with one axis much smaller than others H on order of .001 of L or W
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:sheet_ellipsoid
ControlledConcept.name: sheet ellipsoid

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Ellipsoid with H on order of .01 of L or W
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:pancake_ellipsoid
ControlledConcept.name: pancake ellipsoid

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Ellipsoid with H on order of 0.1 of L or W
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:pillow_ellipsoid
ControlledConcept.name: pillow ellipsoid

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Ellipsoid with L, W, H all approximately equal
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:spheroid
ControlledConcept.name: spheroid

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Ellipsoid with L 2 to 5 times W or H
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:football_ellipsoid
ControlledConcept.name: football ellipsoid

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Ellipsoid with L 10 times W or H
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:bread_loaf_ellipsoid
ControlledConcept.name: bread loaf ellipsoid

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Ellipsoid with L more than 50 times W or H
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:dart_ellipsoid
ControlledConcept.name: dart ellipsoid

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Body with smooth surface, broadly equant shape, irregular protuberances, no symmetry axes, and a boundary that can not be separated into sides.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:blob
ControlledConcept.name: blob

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Body bounded by hemispheroid on one side, cone on other, with circular symmetry around cone axis
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:tear_drop
ControlledConcept.name: tear drop

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Body that is section of a circular or elliptical cylinder formed by a splitting the cylinder along a surface approximately parallel to its long axis. L>>W>H. Source: long axis may be curved as in meandering channel
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:longitudinal_section_of_cylinder
ControlledConcept.name: longitudinal section of cylinder

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Body that is section of a cone formed by splitting the cone along a surface parallel to the cone axis, that interesect approximately along the axis.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:cone_segment
ControlledConcept.name: cone segment

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Cone with central part removed along cylindrical volume approximately along the cone axis
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:discoid_anulus
ControlledConcept.name: discoid anulus

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Section of a spheroid formed by removing everything above a surface that intersects the spheroid. Grades to cone as suface generator (line rotated about axis to generate volume above lower planar boundary) becomes straight.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:hemispheroid
ControlledConcept.name: hemispheroid

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Rock body geometry is irregular and can not be characterized using terminology.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:rock_body_geometry_irregular
ControlledConcept.name: Rock body geometry irregular

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Rock body geometry is not specified. Use in normative descriptions where any morphology is allowed.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:rock_body_geometry_not_specified
ControlledConcept.name: Rock body geometry not specified

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Profile approximates an ellipse; ratio of long axis to short axis is greater than 1.4
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:elliptical_profile
ControlledConcept.name: Elliptical profile

ControlledConcept.gml:description: profile with ratio of long axis length to short axis length greater than 5 with sides that taper to a point, shaped like the profile of an optical lense.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:lenticular_profile
ControlledConcept.name: Lenticular profile

ControlledConcept.gml:description: profile for which the ratio of length of longest chord to shortest chord is less than 1.4.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:equant_profile
ControlledConcept.name: Equant profile

ControlledConcept.gml:description: equant profile with arcuate boundary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:circular_profile
ControlledConcept.name: Circular profile

ControlledConcept.gml:description: equant profile with boundary that can be divided into distinct straight sides separated by higher curvature corners.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:equant_polygonal_profile
ControlledConcept.name: Equant polygonal profile

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Profile for which the ratio of length of longest chord to shortest chord is greater than 1.4.profile and a boundary that can be divided into distinct straight sides separated by higher curvature corners.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:polygonal_profile
ControlledConcept.name: polygonal profile

ControlledConcept.gml:description: polygonal profile that approximates a square
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:square_profile
ControlledConcept.name: Square profile

ControlledConcept.gml:description: profile does not conform to any of the regular geometries associated with other categories in the vocabulary.
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:GeologicUnitMorphology:200811:irregular_profile
ControlledConcept.name: Irregular profile
